title: Stop making champions
body:
I'd rather have 100 great ones than 300 meh ones.

Work on fixing what you've got and learn to rework champions without shooting yourself in the foot.

That is all.

replies.body: As if 100 of the champs we have are "great"
I disagree. Guess everyone has they own opinion  but i think the game would be boring if we don't get new champions.  Whats the point playing the same champions over and over again. That is boring.
Agreed, they could relocate the new champ team to the map skins dept. I'd like more of those.
